titleStmt.title: A letter to a bishop concerning the present settlement and the new oaths
titleStmt.author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: A letter to Gilbert Burnet on the validity of the succession of William and Mary which is attributed by Wing to Thomas Comber.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
